text: @realDonaldTrump You are the #murdererinchief. You knew about the #coronavirus in December. Lied about it. Denied tests and preparation for when it came to US. Lie every day #TrumpVirusCoverup and now will cause many more deaths with making ppl go back to work, just for stock market. #TrumpKills
